title: Girl In The Cellar: The Natascha Kampusch Story
description: Austria 2 March 1998, on her way to school, Natascha Kampusch 10 was abducted by Wolfgang Priklopil. More than 8 years later, 23 August 23 2006, she escaped from a cellar under a seemingly ordinary suburban home. How did she survive? What sort of woman had emerged? What kind of man was her abductor â€” and what demands had he made of her?
author: Allan Hall
